metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:1789-2 -- Recommended update for timezone
metadata.description:
This update provides the latest timezone information for your system. The changes in detail are:
* Update to version 2013h (bnc#850462): o Lybia has switched back to UTC+2 o Western Sahara uses Morocco's DST rules o Acre switches from UTC-4 to UTC-5 on Nov. 10th * Define TM_GMTOFF and TM_ZONE like glibc did (bnc#807624) * Correct path expansion for local time link (bnc#845530).

extend_definition.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 is installed
